description.value: The monster deals the listed amount of damage to any number of creatures @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{restrained} by it. Each of those creatures can attempt a basic Fortitude save with the listed DC. A creature that fails this save falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{unconscious}, and a creature that succeeds is then temporarily immune to falling unconscious from Greater Constrict for 1 minute.
